Instance.description: Autonomous Situation Sim Picker Interaction. Allows customized pick strategies.

TunableVariant.name: choice_strategy
TunableVariant.description: Strategy to use for picking a Sim.

TunableList.name: job_filter
TunableList.description: If provided, only looks for Sims with the specified jobs.

TunableVariant.name: valid_situations
TunableVariant.description: Situations where the guest list will be collected to populate the picker.

TunableTuple.name: by_definition
TunableTuple.description: A tunable which provides a way to search for situations a Sim is in based off provided situation types, whether a situation matches the given definitions, or to find all situations of the given definitions.

TunableTuple.name: by_tags
TunableTuple.description: A tunable which provides a way to find all situations tagged with any of the given tags, search for situations a Sim is in based off provided situation tags, or test whether a situation is tagged with any of the given tags.

TunableEnum.description: Situation tags to match. A situation that matches ANY of these tags will match.
